snippet.title: Super Street: The Game - Launch trailer
snippet.description:
Ready for a new underground street racer? Build your ride and unleash it on the streets! Super Street: The Game brings back classic arcade racing. Available on PS4, Xbox One and Steam. #ssthegame

Order Now: http://www.superstreet-thegame.com/order

About Super Street: The Game
Super Street: The Game is the first official arcade street racing game for Super Street™, the world’s number one in automotive tuning culture. In this street racer you don’t just buy your car, you build it. Start from the bottom with nothing but scrap as you build your dream ride part by part, and use it to tear up asphalt in a wealth of different game modes and environments. Play together in multiplayer: both online and split-screen. 

All footage is captured in-game.
_____________________________________________

For More Information:
Visit the official site at http:// http://http://www.superstreet-thegame...
Like us on Facebook at https://www.facebook.com/SuperStreetGame
